scripts.build_dev: react-scripts build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-package ./build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-install --device Signage_TV com.lg.app.signage.dev_0.0.0_all.ipk && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-launch --device Signage_TV com.lg.app.signage.dev
scripts.build_public: react-scripts build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-package ./build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-install --device Signage_TV com.lg.app.signage.dev_0.0.5_all.ipk && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-launch --device Signage_TV com.lg.app.signage.dev
scripts.build_emul: react-scripts build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-package ./build && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-install --device emulator com.lg.app.signage.dev_0.0.3_all.ipk && C:\webOS_Signage_SDK\CLI\bin\ares-launch --device emulator com.lg.app.signage.dev
